body_html:
I believe @ezyang updated the images yesterday to correctly install NCCL v2.

This is what's broken in these builds: it can't find NCCL v2, so it doesn't include it in the build. This should be fixed though, such that the code in setup.py detects whether or not libc10d_nccl.a is available, and only links it if it is.

body:
I believe @ezyang updated the images yesterday to correctly install NCCL v2.

This is what's broken in these builds: it can't find NCCL v2, so it doesn't include it in the build. This should be fixed though, such that the code in setup.py detects whether or not libc10d_nccl.a is available, and only links it if it is.
